text: @JesseBWatters @realDonaldTrump Four years later @realDonaldTrump  is still blaming Obama and anyone else who is t him. Just bc he isn't willing to take responsibility for his #COVID19 response does not make Obama culpable for Trump's mistakes. Time to drain the WH that's become combative & useless.
